What is the main problem with traditional blockchain systems when it comes to identity and asset control?

Traditional blockchain systems have a fundamental issue where if you lose your private keys, you risk losing access to your cryptocurrency assets, and no one can recover them for you. This trade-off between decentralized, censorship-resistant public systems and the risk of losing control over your assets is considered an acceptable price for having full control over your funds and blockchain assets.
